ProbeItem

class gender_bench.probing.probe_item.ProbeItem(prompts: list[Prompt], num_repetitions: int, metadata: dict[str, Any] | None = None)

ProbeItem is a single test item in the probing process. It can consist of multiple prompts. For example, a single multiple-choice question is a ProbeItem. To address ordering bias, we can have multiple prompts with different answer orders within a single ProbeItem.

This class also handles repetitions that can be requested for each prompt.
